channel.title: Are any of these worth buying
channel.description:
I punched in a dead hard drive's serial number that I found in my room onto the Western Digital's warranty check and while WD said that I couldn't get a replacement, they offered some upgrades [b]at "discount prices"[/b].
Here's the video of what they offered me: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RvE3y9q78h4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RvE3y9q78h4[/url]
Any of them worth the buy/upgrade?
Also, is the 2.5 inch SATA drive an internal laptop HDD?
[b]It is worth noting that if you have a dead hard drive sitting around your house/work, it might be eligible for a free replacement.[/b]

item.title: Are any of these worth buying
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.source: Are any of these worth buying
